content: The iconic Hollywood sign, originally created as an advertisement for a real estate development, is located in which U.S. city?

The iconic Hollywood sign is located in Los Angeles, California, USA. It's a famous landmark that has come to symbolize the American film industry. The sign originally read "Hollywoodland" when it was first erected in 1923, but the "land" was dropped in 1949 when the sign was renovated. Over the years, it has been repaired and restored several times to preserve its status as an internationally recognized symbol of Hollywood.
